metadata.title: Programming Quiz
metadata.description: Web development, coding languages, and frameworks
metadata.author: QuizMint

question.text: Which of the following is NOT a JavaScript framework?
question.feedback: Django is a Python web framework, while Angular, Vue, and React are JavaScript frameworks/libraries.
CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to control the presentation and layout of HTML elements on web pages.

question.text: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
question.feedback: The <a> (anchor) tag is used to create hyperlinks. The 'href' attribute specifies the destination URL.

question.text: Which of these is a valid way to comment in JavaScript?
question.feedback: JavaScript supports both single-line comments with '//' and multi-line comments with '/* ... */'.

question.text: Which database is a NoSQL database?
question.feedback: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents, while the others are relational SQL databases.
